sta-desc: Allows for adding Text annotations to wiki articles.
sta-i18n-welcome: Willkommen bei der Lokalisierungs- und Internationalisierungsdatei der Programmerweiterung Annotator.
sta-special-intro: Welcome on Semantic Text Annotator Extensions Special Page.
sta-button-desc: Click here to annotate this article.
sta-repair-button-desc: Click here to repair moved annotations.
sta-repair-notification: Not all Annotations could be assigned correctly. Please start the Annotations Repair Mode.
sta-autogenerate-summary: Page was autogenerated by Semantic Text Annotator Extension.
sta-install-description: Please click Install Button before using this Extension.
sta-install-success: Installation finished successfully. Please Reload the Page.
sta-category-pageform-assignment-descrip: Here you are able to setup the Annotation Categories used by this Extension. Therefore, you have to assign a PageForms Form to any category and select a color.
sta-main-page-description: This Page shows all Annotations of the Article
sta-repair-welcome-text: In the following steps you are able to correct the moved annotation positions.
sta-please-install: You have not yet installed the Extension. Please go to Special Page.
sta-repair-info-text: After clicking Repair you have to select the annotations new position.
sta-repair-all-done-text: Now you will be redirected to the article page.
